Uses of Interface
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.stop.StopConditionConfigurator

Packages that use StopConditionConfigurator 
Package Description
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.stop
Classes and interfaces for configuration files for stop conditions for information propagation simulations.

  • Uses of StopConditionConfigurator in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.stop

    Classes in es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.stop that implement StopConditionConfigurator 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  MaxTimestampStopConditionConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures a stop condition that establishes a maximum timestamp value.
    class  NoMoreNewStopConditionConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures an stop condition that establishes that the diffusion ends when no new information is propagated.
    class  NoMorePropagatedStopConditionConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures an stop condition that establishes that the diffusion ends when no more information is propagated.
    class  NoMoreTimestampsNorPropInfoStopConditionConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures an stop condition that finishes the diffusion procedure as it reaches the timestamp of the last propagated information piece (according to the diffusion timestamps of a real procedure), and no more information is propagated.
    class  NoMoreTimestampsStopConditionConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures an stop condition that finishes the diffusion procedure as it reaches the timestamp of the last propagated information piece (according to the diffusion timestamps of a real procedure).
    class  NumIterStopConditionConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures an stop condition that finishes the diffusion procedure after a fixed number of iterations.
    class  TotalPropagatedStopConditionConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
    Configures an stop condition that finishes after a given amount of information pieces have been propagated.
